you shoot some portals and make friends with an Irish sphere
what can i say that hasn't been said before, it's a classic game that has been a favorite of mine for many many years

Incredible gameplay for both new and older players. Fun for those who are new to the game and those who have beaten it several times over. Graphics hold up incredibly well for a game made in 2011, as do the gameplay mechanics. Few major glitches or bugs to be mentioned. Very well made coop mode with thought-provoking puzzles that can either enhance or destroy your friendship in a fun way. Great game to play with friends or family, highly recommend.
Incredible CoOp game, really can't believe I never paid for it in the past.  Was only a 5 hour coop play through, but the humor, puzzles, story, narration of the game is fully worth the 10 dollars.
this game is so cool but don't play it if you don't like swearing but other than that i give this game 5 stars cause it's the best game ever

This game can either make you feel very clever or very stupid. I had an ex girlfriend who fell into the latter category. Playing this game with her was both satisfying and frustrating at the same time, much like our intimacy.
Holy crap what a wonderfull game.Would recommend it to everyone.The puzzles were fun and pretty creative and the story was interesting and not too boring.A pretty solid and great game.

Â¿Portal 2? Vale la pena los 129.99 pesos, diria que tambien vale la pena el Portal 1 pero no hace falta aclararlo, tipo ya deberias saberlo Â¿Quien se compra la parte dos de un juego sin comprar el uno? Tambien te recomiendo esperar a las ofertas de Halloween, Navidad o alguna estacion del aÃ±o, ya que puede salir 20 pesos o algo por el estilo. La voz de Wheatley es una hermosura, me moja, es el alivio comico que se necesita para contrarrestar a la ironia de GLaDOS, los puzzles te hacen pensar bastante, si tenes alguna deficiencia no te recomiendo jugarlo, no creo que lo termines.
En resumen, vale la pena, puzzles con alguna dificultad, buena historia y comedia. Gracias por leer
only fun if you love puzzles

This game was responsible for me to learn abut valve. This game helped me actually start to get good at games. This game defiantly shaped my sense of humor, and my sarcasm. This was the game I made this account to play, and I have fun every time I play it. Would recommend this to get people to start playing games with story and humor and puzzles. Every time I play a game on Steam, this game is to thank.

TL;DR: Wheatly Crab and POTaTOS  are funny and made me like PC games.

Juegazo 
Es divertido los personajes son carismaticos y es una buena secuela al primer portal
